    • addMoveToQueue

      public void addMoveToQueue(Move m)
      addMoveToQueue() is used to add a move coming from the client to a list containing all the moves that need to be realized on the rocketship
      Parameters:
      m - is the move added to the queue

    • startProcessingMoves

      public void startProcessingMoves()

    • terminateMoveProcessorThread

      public void terminateMoveProcessorThread()

    • beginFlight

      public void beginFlight()
      the method draws a card, set the adventure controller as listener for possible requests and then activates the card
      Throws:
      Exception - if there are no more cards in the deck but a draw request is sent anyway
